items.name: EvCAT
items.info: Event Category, if >0:  e-, e-p, e-pi+.....

items.name: NPGP
items.info: Number of Final (Timed-based) Reconstructed Particles*100 + Number of Geometrically Reconstructed Particles

items.name: TRG
items.info: Trigger Type (CLAS12_e-, FT_CLAS12_h, CLAS12_H,...) + Prescale Factor for that Trigger

items.name: Helic
items.info: Helicity of Event (0 or 1, else undefined)

items.name: status
items.info: particle status (represents detector collection it passed)

items.name: index
items.info: index of the hit in the specific detector bank

items.name: pindex
items.info: row number in the particle bank hit is associated with

items.name: detector
items.info: Detector ID, defined in COATJAVA DetectorType

items.name: path
items.info: Path from vertex to the hit position (cm)

items.name: hx
items.info: X coordinate of the matched hit (cm)

items.name: hy
items.info: Y coordinate of the mathced hit (cm)

items.name: hz
items.info: Z coordinate of the matched hit (cm)

items.name: m2u
items.info: 2nd moment of the shower on U-side

items.name: m2v
items.info: 2nd moment of the shower on V-side

items.name: m2w
items.info: 2nd moment of the shower on W-side

items.name: m3u
items.info: 3rd moment of the shower on U-side

items.name: m3v
items.info: 3rd moment of the shower on V-side

items.name: m3w
items.info: 3rd moment of the shower on W-side

items.name: nphe
items.info: Number of photoelectrons from Cherenkov radiation

items.name: path
items.info: Path from vertex to the hit position (cm)

items.name: theta
items.info: DEPRECATED, TO BE REMOVED.  Theta of the matched hit (deg)

items.name: phi

info: Track Cross information for Particles bank

items.name: index1
items.info: index of the first track in Tracks bank

items.name: index2
items.info: index of the second track in Tracks bank

items.name: x1
items.info: x-position of the first track at the DOCA point (cm)

items.name: y1
items.info: y-position of the first track at the DOCA point (cm)

items.name: z1
items.info: z-position of the first track at the DOCA point (cm)

items.name: cx1
items.info: x-direction vector of the first track at the DOCA point (cm)

items.name: cy1
items.info: y-direction vector of the first track at the DOCA point (cm)

items.name: cz1
items.info: z-direction vector of the first track at the DOCA point (cm)

items.name: x2
items.info: x-position of the second track at the DOCA point (cm)

items.name: y2
items.info: y-position of the second track at the DOCA point (cm)

items.name: z2
items.info: z-position of the second track at the DOCA point (cm)

items.name: cx2
items.info: x-direction vector of the second track at the DOCA point (cm)

items.name: cy2
items.info: y-direction vector of the second track at the DOCA point (cm)

items.name: cz2
items.info: z-direction vector of the second track at the DOCA point (cm)

items.name: pindex
items.info: index of the particle in REC::Particle

items.name: index
items.info: index of the track in its tracking bank

items.name: x
items.info: x-position of the track at the detector surface (cm)

items.name: y
items.info: y-position of the track at the detector surface (cm)

items.name: z
items.info: z-position of the track at the detector surface (cm)

items.name: cx
items.info: direction cosline of the track at the detector surface

items.name: cy
items.info: direction cosline of the track at the detector surface

items.name: cz
items.info: direction cosline of the track at the detector surface

items.name: pathlength
items.info: pathlength of the track to the detector surface from the DOCA point (cm)
